title: Tracks Eraser Pro 7.01
description:
Tracks Eraser Pro 7.01    

Erase all tracks of your Internet activity!

Windows Vista Support
Internet history erasing
Windows history Erasing 
Secure Erasing files beyond recovery
Support over 100 popular applications
Mozilla FireFox support
Internet Explorer 7 support
Apple Safari browser support
Custom Items
File Shredder
Clean Disk Free Space (Wipe previously deleted files beyond recovery, 
now support removable disk)
Scheduling Erasing
Stealth Mode
Boss Key
AOL 9 support
Outlook Express support
Homepage Protection
Recycle Bin Shred

Internet Eraser Pro&#039;s other great features includes:
Secure Erasing overwrites the files a specified times with blank character, gives 
you the confidence that once erased by Internet History Eraser, the files will be
gone and no one can recover/undelete them. See more...
Custom Erase Item you can choose to erase your own files and registry
Homepage Protection prevent the websites from modifying your homepage
Boss Key you can hide the opened browser&#039;s windows when other come in
Free up valuable hard-drive space it can free up a lot of disk space used
by the cache and temp files.
Clean Free Space Clean the free space of hard disk by overwriting 
every bytes of the free space with blank characters. this makes the 
deleted files unrecoverable. See more...
 
Schedule Erase you can start an erase on windows startup/shutdown, or 
browser&#039;s shutdown, and even a specified interval you chose.
 
Stealth Mode It can run in the background silently, no one except you know 
it&#039;s working and protecting your privacy.
Test Mode you can see what files and registry entries will be erased before 
they are really erased.

Url.........http://www.acesoft.net/

----------------------------------
Extract with Winrar.
Install.
Generate yourself a serial using the keygen.
----------------------------------

Enjoy!!
